branchCategory.name: Belt Drive Low Profile
branchCategory.description: The LEM electric actuator family features the lowest table height of all sliders, 40mm or less. Four series are available, including basic, cam follower guide, and single or double axis linear guides. Belt drives permit longer strokes and higher speeds than ball screw sliders. Guided types permit higher workloads than the LEFB or LEL.

branchItem.name: LEMB, Electric Actuator, Low Profile Slider, Basic Type, Step Motor (Servo/24 VDC)
branchItem.description: The LEM electric actuator family features the lowest table height of all sliders, 40mm or less. Four series are available, including basic, cam follower guide, and single or double axis linear guides. Belt drives permit longer strokes and higher speeds than ball screw sliders. Guided types permit higher workloads than the LEFB or LEL.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>Intended for light load transfer or in combination with external guide <LI>Body sizes: 25, 32 <LI>Table height: 40 mm <LI>Maximum stroke: 2000 mm <LI>Maximum speed: 1000 mm/s
</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: LEMC Electric Actuator, Low Profile Slider Type, Cam Follower Guide Type, Step Motor (Servo/24 VDC)
branchItem.description: The LEM electric actuator family features the lowest table height of all sliders, 40mm or less. Four series are available, including basic, cam follower guide, and single or double axis linear guides. Belt drives permit longer strokes and higher speeds than ball screw sliders. Guided types permit higher workloads than the LEFB or LEL.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>Cam follower guide offset from drive for low table height and increased work load <LI>Body sizes: 25, 32 <LI>Table height: 28 or 37 mm <LI>Maximum stroke: 2000 mm <LI>Maximum speed: 1000 mm/s
</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: LEMH/HT Electric Actuator, Low Profile Slider Type, Linear Guide, Single/Double Axis Type, Step Motor (Servo/24 VDC)
branchItem.description: The LEM electric actuator family features the lowest table height of all sliders, 40mm or less. Four series are available, including basic, cam follower guide, and single or double axis linear guides. Belt drives permit longer strokes and higher speeds than ball screw sliders. Guided types permit higher workloads than the LEFB or LEL.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>LEMH: Single axis linear guide provides higher moment resistance than LEMC <LI>LEMHT: Double axis linear guide provides higher moment resistance than LEMH <LI>LEMH & LEMHT: Body sizes: 25, 32 <LI>LEMH & LEMHT: Table height: 28 mm (25); 37 mm (32) <LI>LEMH & LEMHT: Maximum stroke: 1000 mm (25) ; 1500 mm (32) <LI>LEMH & LEMHT: Maximum speed: 2000 mm/s
</LI></UL>
